Specimen Type: Serum or plasma (preferred); whole blood in EDTA or heparin tubes (acceptable)
Purpose: To measure the concentration of Amantadine (Symmetrel) in patient specimens for therapeutic drug monitoring.
Container: Serum or plasma collection tube; EDTA or heparin tube for whole blood
Equipment: High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) or LC-MS/MS system; centrifuge; vortex mixer
